name: Linda S. KAISER, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania as Statutory Liquidator of Colonial Assurance Company, v. COLONIAL ASSURANCE COMPANY. Appeal of ROYAL BANK OF CANADA
docket_number: Appeal from No. 67 M.D. Appeal Dkt. 1995

parties: Linda S. KAISER, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania as Statutory Liquidator of Colonial Assurance Company, v. COLONIAL ASSURANCE COMPANY. Appeal of ROYAL BANK OF CANADA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of April, 1996, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

673 A.2d 922
